q_ch: 2024年4月30日前完成的裁剪任务有哪些？
q_en: What cutting tasks will be completed before April 30, 2024?
gt:
Sure thing! Here are the cutting tasks that will be completed before April 30, 2024. I've organized them into a neat table for you! 📅✂️

| Task ID | End Time          | Working Group Name  | Order Product ID |
|---------|-------------------|---------------------|------------------|
| 18      | April 7, 2024     | Precision Cutters   | 18               |
| 30      | April 26, 2024    | Precision Cutters   | 30               |

Hope this helps! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. 😊

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE ct.end_time < '2024-04-30';
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting tasks that have an end time before April 30, 2024
